gurmukhi: ਗੁਰਮੁਖਿ ਸਬਦ ਸੁਰਤਿ ਲਿਵ ਸਾਧਸੰਗਿ ਪਰਮਦਭੁਤ ਪ੍ਰੇਮ ਪੂਰਨ ਪ੍ਰਗਾਸੇ ਹੈ
transliteration: Gurmukhi Sabad Surati Liv Saadhasangi , Paramadabhout Praym Pooran Pragaasay Hai ?
translation: Supernatural love grows in the heart of an obedient disciple of the Guru when he lodges the divine word in his consciousness and keeps the company of holy men.

gurmukhi: ਪ੍ਰੇਮ ਰੰਗ ਮੇ ਅਨੇਕ ਰੰਗ ਜਿੳੁ ਤਰੰਗ ਗੰਗ ਪ੍ਰੇਮ ਰਸ ਮੇ ਅਨੇਕ ਰਸ ਹੁੲਿ ਬਿਲਾਸੇ ਹੈ
transliteration: Praym Rang May Anayk Rang Jiu Tarang Ganga , Praym Ras May Anayk Ras Hui Bilaasay Hai ?
translation: The company of saintly persons and perpetual Naam Simran, creates a loving hue like the waves of river Ganges that generates multi-coloured effects. The Guru-conscious person enjoys many elixirs in this loving state.

gurmukhi: ਪ੍ਰੇਮ ਗੰਧ ਸੰਧਿ ਮੈ ਸੁਗੰਧ ਸੰਬੰਧ ਕੋਟਿ ਪ੍ਰੇਮ ਸ੍ਰੁਤਿ ਅਨਿਕ ਅਨਾਹਦ ੳੁਲਾਸੇ ਹੈ
transliteration: Praym Gandh Sandhi Mai Sougandh Sanbandh Koti , Praym Srouti Anik Anaahad Ulaasay Hai ?
translation: Due to the practicing of Naam Simran, that fragrance is the combination of millions of fragrances. And the unstruck Music emerging from the loving fragrance of God, contains the pleasure of many modes of singing.

gurmukhi: ਪ੍ਰੇਮ ਅਸਪਰਸ ਕੋਮਲਤਾ ਸੀਤਲਤਾ ਕੈ ਅਕਥ ਕਥਾ ਬਿਨੋਦ ਬਿਸਮ ਬਿਸ੍ਵਾਸੇ ਹੈ ॥੧੬੯॥
transliteration: Praym Asaparas Komalataa Seetalataa Kai , Akad Kadaa Binod Bisam Bisvaasay Hai ?169?
translation: None can reach the sensitivity and coolness of that love generated by Naam Simran). The pleasures and ecstasy are describable. It generates marvellous faith. (169)
